body.p:
Henderson Aug 31 1861
To Hon Beriah Magoffin

Dear Sir I have been fined by the common wealth for selling liquor to slaves which I think was very unjust from the evidence and thought I would write to you for your consideration whether you would remit it or not it has fifteen days to run hoping you will consider the times and also my case

I remain Your obident servent
C A Brown
Henderson
KY
